item.title: pagination
item.description: From Pluralsight/Building a Data-driven ASP.NET Core 6 Blazor Server Application with EF Core Overview Pagination allows you to limit the number of results you return per page and allows the user to request more results by specifying a page number. Implement Pagination Implementing pagination functionality involves: Counting the total number of records the Component has Specifying the number of records to show per page Using the above, counting the total number of pages (pages = records / recordsPerPage) Updating the logic to account for invalid page requests such as 0 or a number greater than the total number of pages Updating the page routes to include a pagination parameter EmployeeOverview.
